ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( /* commented by DHE 2018-11-13 $Profile.Name ="Signature team",*/ $Permission.Signature_team_Custom_Permission , ISCHANGED(EBH_EUSignNotes__c), OR( ISPICKVAL( Status, 'Executed'), ISPICKVAL( Status, 'Expired'), ISPICKVAL( Status, 'Voided') ) ) && NOT( $Setup.ActiveValidationRules__c.All_Validation_Rules_Deactivated__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please changes can't be made at this stage.
